org.apache.hadoop.hbase

Class TestChoreService.ScheduledChoreSamples.FailInitialChore

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.ScheduledChore
      • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.TestChoreService.ScheduledChoreSamples.FailInitialChore
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable
    Enclosing class:
    TestChoreService.ScheduledChoreSamples

    public static class TestChoreService.ScheduledChoreSamples.FailInitialChore
extends org.apache.hadoop.hbase.ScheduledChore
    A Chore that will try to execute the initial chore a few times before succeeding. Once the initial chore is complete the chore cancels itself

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class org.apache.hadoop.hbase.ScheduledChore
